info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 12:05AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of very heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 2 to 4 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1204 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Grahamsville to Amenia to near New Hartford and moving northeast at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Waterbury, Torrington, Poughkeepsie, New Milford, Kingston, Beacon, New Paltz, Ellenville, Saugerties, Sherman, Rhinebeck, Pawling, Wallkill, Hyde Park, Milton, Brookfield, Plattekill, Canton, Pleasant Valley, and Thomaston. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 20. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
